item.title: StaticMatic: Static HTML building framework
item.description: StaticMatic is a Ruby-powered framework for building static HTML prototypes. It builds your directory structure and files, uses templates for common page elements, uses Haml (HTML abstraction markup language) to generate markup, and Sass to create your CSS. Via Jérôme Gravel-Niquet on the htmlprototyping group http://staticmatic.rubyforge.org/
